content:
jeschkies opened Issue #2536:

Forgive me if I'm mistaken. It seems the WASI-tutorial and related WASI docs are not published to https://docs.wasmtime.dev/. At least I couldn't find them through the page but did through Google.

alexcrichton commented on Issue #2536:

Yes at this time these aren't published (they're inherited from original documentation some time ago), but we could perhaps clean them up and publish them too though!
